## Links to Exercises

NOTE: AcroScore is an automated answer collection and grading system.  We're recruiting  volunteers to convert exercises to WebWork or other systems.  If you are using AcroScore, make sure to add `?access=KEY` to each URL, where `KEY` is the AcroScore access code for your course.  Otherwise, you can simply use the URL as is.
